PIT_MODULE

Abstract output module for PIT.

Properties
fire_threshold

Log level above which the module does not react anymore. Is used to control the amount of messages processed by the respective module

status

Status indicating whether this module can be used or not

stack

If this module is unusable, this property contains information about the reason.

Functions
context_changed
member procedure context_changed(
self in out nocopy pit_module,
p_ctx in pit_context_type
)

Method is raised if the context settings have changed

Parameter
p_ctx
in pit_context_type

Instance of pit_context with the information about the new context.

tweet
member procedure tweet(
self in out nocopy pit_module,
p_message in message_type
)

Method is called for lightweight developer output

Parameter
p_message
in message_type

Instance of PIT_TWEET message

log
member procedure log(
self in out nocopy pit_module,
p_message in message_type
)

Method is called for debugging, error handling and the like

Parameter
p_message
in message_type

Instance of message_type, the message to log

context_changed

Overloaded logging method to log the state of variables passed in

Parameter
p_log_state

Instance of <pit_log_state_type> with the key and values to log

print
member procedure print(
self in out nocopy pit_module,
p_message in message_type
)

Method to print a message to the target. Is not fenced in by log or trace settings

Parameter
p_message
in message_type

Instance of message_type, the message to print.

notify
member procedure notify (
self in out nocopy pit_module,
p_message in message_type
)

Method to notify outout modules. Leightweight message.

Parameter
p_message
in message_type

Instance of message_type, the message to pass as a notification

enter
member procedure enter (
self in out nocopy pit_module,
p_call_stack pit_call_stack_type
)

Method is called if PIT recognizes that the code enters a method

Parameter
p_call_stack
pit_call_stack_type

Instance of pit_call_stack_type with the call stack information

leave
member procedure leave (
self in out nocopy pit_module,
p_call_stack pit_call_stack_type
)

Method is called if PIT recognizes that the code left a method

Parameter
p_call_stack
pit_call_stack_type

Instance of pit_call_stack_type with the call stack information

purge
member procedure purge(
self in out nocopy pit_module,
p_purge_date in date default null,
p_severity_greater_equal in integer default null
)

Method is called to purge a message stack. Useful for output modules persisting messages

Parameter
p_purge_date
in date

Date, before which all entries have to be purged

p_severity_greater_equal
in integer

Optional level to further filter the log entries to purge
